game.name: Memento Dawn
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 수시 저장, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A colorful puzzle game that follows a lost child on a journey to search for her memories and helps her through the darkness by controlling light and shadow.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A colorful puzzle game that follows a lost child on a journey to search for her memories and helps her through the darkness by controlling light and shadow.
